about.summary: Continuous control environments and MuJoCo Python bindings.

commands: pytest --pyargs dm_control -v -k "not (viewer or render or glfw or Camera or cmu or rodent or termination or escape or maze or ant or ball or task or Depth or Scene or Overlay or Context or 39 or visualize or Pixels or test_physics_error_message_in_debug_mode or ExportWithAssetsAsZipTest)"

about.summary: Continuous control environments and MuJoCo Python bindings.

commands: pytest --pyargs dm_control -v -k "not (viewer or render or glfw or Camera or cmu or rodent or termination or escape or maze or ant or ball or task or Depth or Scene or Overlay or Context or 39 or visualize or Pixels or test_physics_error_message_in_debug_mode or ExportWithAssetsAsZipTest)"

name: dm-control
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "dm-control" %}
{% set version = "1.0.9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/d/dm_control/dm_control-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 452f175bd04fdd0692c01cfa25dc09ff7ce61a81674f92cb1c4ac0f5cb6e1fb0

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - mujoco
  host:
    - python >=3.7
    - mujoco
    - pip
    - pyparsing >=3.0.0

  run:
    - python >=3.7
    - absl-py >=0.7.0
    - dm-env
    - dm-tree !=0.1.2
    - glfw
    - labmaze
    - lxml
    - mujoco >=2.3.0
    - numpy >=1.9.0
    - protobuf >=3.19.4
    - pyopengl >=3.1.4
    - pyparsing >=3.0.0
    - requests
    - setuptools !=50.0.0
    - scipy
    - tqdm
    - pillow

test:
  imports:
    - dm_control
  commands:
    - pip check
    # All tests excluded (except for the test_physics_error_message_in_debug_mode and ExportWithAssetsAsZipTest) are excluded as they required to create a GL context
    # test_physics_error_message_in_debug_mode and ExportWithAssetsAsZipTest are excluded due to some Windows failures in loading test assets
    - pytest --pyargs dm_control -v -k "not (viewer or render or glfw or Camera or cmu or rodent or termination or escape or maze or ant or ball or task or Depth or Scene or Overlay or Context or 39 or visualize or Pixels or test_physics_error_message_in_debug_mode or ExportWithAssetsAsZipTest)"
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest
    - mock
    - h5py

about:
  home: https://github.com/deepmind/dm_control
  summary: Continuous control environments and MuJoCo Python bindings.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - traversaro
